resources.string: This app allows to quickly toggle any of the system profiles of LineageOS/Cyanogenmod using a widget from the home screen.
Choose foreground color of the icons
Choose background color of the icons
When you click in the widget, a popup window will let you choose the new profile to activate.
When you click in the widget, the next profile of the list will be activated. By clicking multiple times you advance to desired profile.
This app works only on Android versions based on LineageOS/Cyanogenmod. Sorry, LineageOS/Cyanogenmod has not been detected.
The system profiles are not active. To activate them go to Settings / System Profiles.
There isn´t any system profile defined. To add some profile go to Settings / System Profiles.
